column4: How can I move my ubuntu installation to another hard drive (it's currently installed on an external drive which is very slow)?
How can I move my ubuntu installation to another hard drive (it's currently installed on an external drive which is very slow)?
How can I move my ubuntu installation to another hard drive (it's currently installed on an external drive which is very slow)?
alternatively you could look into cloning your current HD with dd or going fs by fs with dump/restore ...
